import { useState } from "react" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" function ProductInfo() { const [data, SetData] = useState({ name: '', fullName: '', age: '', gender: '', skill: [] }) const onchangeHandler = (e) => { const obj = { ...data } const value = e.target.value obj[e.target.name] = value SetData(obj) console.log(obj); } const details = ()=>{ console.log(data); } return (
